newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-LOMU REMAINS DOUBTFUL FOR ENGLAND GAME.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-LOMU REMAINS DOUBTFUL FOR ENGLAND GAME.

text.p: Jonah Lomu remained doubtful on Friday to play for the New Zealand Barbarians in Saturday's match against England.
Coach John Hart said he rated Lomu's chances of playing at 50-50 after the giant winger, who tormented England with four tries in last year's World Cup, was struck by a groin infection.
"He is still very doubtful. He is a little improved under the antibiotic treatment but still a long way away," said Hart.
"If we were playing right now he would not be playing. I think he is quite devastated. He has had a really frustrating season and this just adds to his frustration."
